tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good treatment and experience. Doctor explained in detail about my concern and will definitely recommend to others

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Nita on urgent basis as i was suffering from severe toothache.On first visit she did xray and had done a pin pointed analysis and suggested to do RCT for the cavity developed between molar and pre molar teeth that yo be done in n 2 subsequent sittings.surprisingly i was about to see impact of the treatment in the evening on day 1.Now i am feeling better and have planned future oral hygiene and treatments with her.Dr. Nita is very passionate about her profession. She is very transparent on the treatment plans and gives a heads-up for the next appointment and the procedures to be done before patient leaves the clinicThe cost of treatment is really reasonable within Bangalore and transparent and no hidden charges.She is also careful and not in a hurry to finish the scheduled appointment. if a scheduled procedure takes longer time she divides the treatment into multiple settings.Overall i recommend Dr. Nita Kashyap for a must visit for the patients for all your Oral problems
reply_text: Hi Swarup - It's wonderful to hear that you got a great service. Thank you so much for supporting us with your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had appointment with Dr. Nita for the first time for my wisdom tooth pain and gum swelling. Although I was meeting her for the first time, she is very friendly and genuine. She had a detailed examination, completely and explained to me the issues as well as showed it to me. When I enquired on the different types of treatment, she took time off in her busy schedules and cleared all my doubts. She recommended treatment for my genuine dental issues and advised against high cost non-required treatment. She is friendly, a go-to-doctor and affords cost effective treatment. I had recommended her to all my friends, spouse and relatives for dental treatment. I appreciate and thank her for her service. Thank you madam.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: We had visited Dr Nita Kashyap for Dental cysts issue, since my husband had met with an accident long back. ** *** ****** **** ******** **** ***** *** ** *** ** ****** ** ******* *** ************* ******** ** she had informed a surgeon to her clinic to do the process  and charged us heavily. She assisted the surgeon and told us that the process was done with so much pain had been occurred to the patient. But the same issue came back after 6 months ***** *** ******* *** *** **** ********* ** **** ** ****** *********** ** *** ***** no empathy towards the patient, no value for the money paid, *** ** *** ***** **** *************** Will she refund the money or take our pain back. ******* ** *** ********** *** ******* *** ** ** ******* *** **** **** ****** I request everyone to check the reviews before you visit her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cavity Filling,Dental Checkup (General),Composite tooth filling,Bleeding Gums Treatment,
review: I am grateful to Dr. Nita Kashyap for being kind, friendly, and professional and for a smooth and pain free experience of getting fillings for cavities. She is knowledgeable, precise and detailed in her work and skilled at doing dental procedures and treatment. I appreciate her considerate and caring demeanour and her skillful and thorough diagnosis as well as efficient and precise treatment. Thank you to the dental assistant as well. I recommend this clinic as their professional expertise, integrity and compassionate concern will help you get your smile back.
reply_text: Hi Aditi - It's wonderful to hear that you got a great service. Thank you so much for supporting us with your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental X-Ray,Dental Cavities,Dental Cleaning,Dental Checkup (General),
review: Dr. Nita is very friendly and genuine. This was my first time appointment with her. I have gone for a general dental checkup along with dental filling and cleaning. She will explain the problem and procedure clearly and patiently. She was very gentle in her approach, performed the x-ray before suggesting any solution, and based on x-ray results, she has advised me of the procedure. Gives ample time to patients. Do not hurry while treatment. She is friendly, a go-to-doctor, and affords cost-effective treatment. I recommend her to all for any dental treatment. I appreciate and thank her for her service. Thank you, Dr. Nita.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Scaling / Polishing,
review: I got my RCT and Dental Filings done by Dr. Nita. She explained the issue very elaborately, recommended the best possible treatments and the judgement of whether to go for the treatment or not was solely left to me. The procedure was very smooth, and I didn't face any pain during the treatment. RCT was completed in 3 sessions (including cap fixing) and filings were done smoothly in one sitting. I would definitely recommend the Dental Hub to anyone who is facing dental issues as well as for regular check ups. Dr. Nita is exceptionally adept in her work. Additionally, the rates are very reasonable compared to market standards in Bangalore, and you'll be more than happy to pay quoted amount for the level of treatment received.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for a wisdom tooth extraction on my upper molar area. The doctor's name was Dr. Imran. I'm sorry I don't know his full name. He visits The Dental Hub in bysandra area CV Raman Nagar. I was really nervous about the extraction as this was my first time but I was literally blown away by the experience. The doctor was kind and explained me all the details about the procedure. It just took around 5 minutes for the extraction and it was painless (obviously because of the anesthesia) and quick. He then explained me what I needed to do next and he even repeated 2 to 3 times if in case I forget. Highly recommend Dr. Imran if you have any problems regarding your tooth. Hope this review helps and good luck!! üôèüëç

review: Went for a tooth filling and the doctor explained the process to me beforehand. She explained all the sensations I may feel and was very patient. I really appreciated the fact that Dr Nita came in on her off-day, and it really shows how much she cares about her patient's satisfaction.

review: doctor suggested root canal and was done but in less than 1 year started getting same issue..visited the doc and she again suggesting removal of root canal and doing it again..*** ***** ******* ** **** ****** **** **** *** **** *********** *****
reply_text:
Hi Shiuli,

Thank you for the feedback, We would like to clarify on few things as the information you have provided are not correct.

Your RCT was done on March 2020(around 2 years ago) and you were informed about the possible future infection because of the adjacent tooth(malalignment). As per the current situation, you are having pain due to food lodgement between the treated tooth and the adjacent tooth for which we planned a consultation with the prosthodontist and decide further treatment plan, we never suggested ReRCT at the first place. Our focus is always to provide quality and best possible treatment.

You had also visited us on April 2021 for full mouth cleaning and did not have any complaint or discomfort.

Our priority is and will always be patient satisfaction and we will be more than happy to provide you the best treatment possible.

The Dental Hub

review: I booked for doctor Preeti but I was swapped with Nita Kashyap. I had bad experience ** * *** ******* *** ******* *** ***** ** ***** *** *********** I had to go next day for getting the completed issue fixed.
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

Team Dental Hub values your opinion and always take all the feedback very seriously as we strive for a better experience for the patients. However, we strongly oppose such allegations of not being transparent. 100+ positive feedbacks from satisfied customers are proof of that. We have been in this business for over 6 years now and have always maintained a transparent and justified charging system of the treatment provided.

You were clearly explained everything during consultation with 2 x-rays of 2 different parts of your mouth to get seriousness of the cavity. You were told that you can opt for cleaning before going for filling (which will be done next day). You even called your husband and then only confirmed that you want to get the cleaning done. A simple NO would have avoided your dissatisfaction. All the charges for consultation, x-rays, cleaning and filling were told before proceeding and we went ahead only after your confirmation (and your husband's). As we value the customer we just charged for one x-ray. 

The filling was done next day as promised. We take pride in our services would like to inform others reading the feedback to visit the clinic and experience our services firsthand. You editing your feedback thrice speaks volume about the confusion you have regarding how you want to bring the whole thing in a bad light. We hope you are feeling much better after the treatment and we would always be available to help you in any way possible in future as well.

Thanks and regards,
Team Dental Hub

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: we went for my son dental check up. Doctor dont have patience. Didn't explain the procedure. No Fiendliness. Sure I won't recommend this doctor
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

Thank you for feedback. We have tried our best to provide you the best treatment and followed our best practices during the whole process. There are certain things that are out of our control. Your kid started screaming and crying during the consultation itself on 30th Nov (when we didn't even start the treatment) and you were not able to stop him and let us talk. Still the doctor managed and explained you the whole process and cost but you still wanted the doctor to explain the procedure and cost on your next visit this month, which we did gladly again.

Your son was not ready to sit in the chair, let alone start the treatment, and we spent around 45 minutes just to calm him. You were clearly told if your son is not able to cooperate we will have to ask a child specialist (pedodontist) for which charges will be extra but you were not ready for that too. 

Even after 2 visits for consultation you haven't paid the full amount (Rs 300) and for treatment which we started and spent 45 minutes of effort you did not pay anything.

We as The Dental Hub team try our best to ensure a smooth process and treatment where everything is explained in advance and the patient feels comfortable. If you are ready to get a pedodontist examine and treat your child you can visit the clinic again and I'm sure we will be able to change your view.
- The Dental Hub
